benchmark_details.name: Unanswerable Math Word Problem (UMWP)
benchmark_details.overview: The UMWP dataset includes both answerable and unanswerable math word problems to investigate how GPT models respond to unanswerable scenarios and improve their abstention capabilities.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the performance of GPT models in handling unanswerable math word problems using various prompting strategies.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The dataset includes a limited range of math word problems and does not explore the performance of models across different mathematical categories.

data.source: The UMWP dataset, containing both answerable and unanswerable math word problems, was utilized for evaluation.
data.annotation: The dataset consists of pairs of answerable and unanswerable questions where unanswerable variants were created by perturbing the original questions.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy is calculated as the proportion of correct predictions made by the model out of the total number of predictions.
methodology.interpretation: A high score in confidence balance indicates better performance in accurately predicting answers while maintaining confidence.
methodology.validation: The evaluation metrics assess the ability of models to abstain from answering unanswerable questions and correct the answerable ones.
